title: Avalondisc
author: Avalondisc
content: Selling a fully coded gambling bot with auto deposits and withdraws!Games included - Blackjack, Roulette, Limbo, Keno, Lootboxes, and Coinflip!Balance, Rain, Tip, ProvablyFair, Stats, and more commands included!DM me offers! Or msg me on discord - tatola5

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: Avalondisc on October 22, 2023, 07:04:16 PMSelling a fully coded gambling bot with auto deposits and withdraws!Games included - Blackjack, Roulette, Limbo, Keno, Lootboxes, and Coinflip!Balance, Rain, Tip, ProvablyFair, Stats, and more commands included!DM me offers! Or msg me on discord - tatola5Why do users need to send you messages on Discord for the offers? You could post the details here if so anyone can contact you if the people are interested. Without details, almost no legal users will contact you.
